Allen Iverson sank the first buzzer-beating shot of his nine-year career, a 14-footer in overtime, and scored 15 points to lead the Philadelphia 76ers to a 106-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Friday night. It's a great feeling to hit a shot with no time on the clock, said Allen Iverson , who sank a halfcourt winner for the US Olympic team against Germany in an exhibition game. Bernie Sanders of Vermont.`` Social Security has not contributed a dime to the debt or the deficit,'' he said, calling the program rock-solid for at least another 27 years. That was a reference to the moment when Social Security's trustees project that the system's trust fund-- financed by payroll taxes that are segregated from other federal levies-- will run out.
